subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The five-set epic that ended with Rafael Nadal dethroning Roger Federer will usher in a new phase in men’s tennis, just as Wimbledon prepares to embark on a more resolutely modern era of its own.
snippet: The five-set epic that ended with Rafael Nadal dethroning Roger Federer will usher in a new phase in men’s tennis, just as Wimbledon prepares to embark on a more resolutely modern era of its own.
